attributes.action: STOP the continual rises in community tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tax has kept on rising for years and we are fed up to the high teeth about this and it should stop....    where do the councils think we are getting the money from... we don`t have this sort of money just to keep on paying .....  WE HAVE OTHER BILLS AS WELL

rejection.details:
There are lots of petitions on this:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
